hooks.command: case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in *.env*) echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit .env files directly' >&2; exit 2;; esac
case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.mjs) npx eslint --fix "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true;; esac
case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in *.ts|*.tsx) npx tsc --noEmit --pretty 2>&1 | head -20 || true;; esac
